body:
It was a fantastic run and more than i could have ever hoped for in gaming BC you are all truly amazing people and i love you all to bits:
Ciaran, Notal, Remy,  Caiden, Jive, Robin, Ronloyd, Tazz you all made a huge impact with me and thanks for sticking with me through everything to you old BC members.

I'm leaving Avicus for a bit maybe permanently maybe temporarily, i'm stepping down from leader of BC and Jr map dev.  It's  been a fantastic 3 years and i'll never forget any of you. 

Well played to PPB, fuck you Ihze and yup see you all another day.

replies.body: I watched tie finals in the stream, and I must say that it was quite an intense last match. I'm happy for both teams and the last match was amazing! This was a much better tourney than the first one and I'm glad that these two teams were in the finals! Hopefully you come back so we can have you build maps for the tourney again!
replies.body_tagged: I watched tie finals in the stream, and I must say that it was quite an intense last match. I'm happy for both teams and the last match was amazing! This was a much better tourney than the first one and I'm glad that these two teams were in the finals! Hopefully you come back so we can have you build maps for the tourney again!
